messages.name: Karen
messages.text: Hey man, when can you come to hang over? I`ll be free today

messages.name: Alex
messages.text: Hi, maybe I`ll be free after work today. I`ll call you

messages.name: Hayk
messages.text: Yesterday I did great job with my application, you can check it out on my page

messages.name: Karen
messages.text: Merry Christmas and a happy New Year

messages.name: Alex
messages.text: My car is in service center now, I can`t visit you

messages.name: Hayk
messages.text: So, what is up with that job?

messages.name: Karen
messages.text: Have you ever thought about living in another country?
